content:
Dear LTE'rs,

Two years after the completion of the LTE there still isn't a paper, and I apologize for this. There have been several false starts, that failed for various reasons. Everytime, my idea was that writing a paper (that would have a larger set of authors) should be done by a small group of people. But this has not worked out so far.

After discussing with Adam and Patrick (who also worked on the latest version), we have decided that we want to try a different approach, inspired by the authoring process of the odd order paper (about which Cyril Cohen told me a few weeks ago).

  • We want to have a private stream, for discussions about the paper.
  • Everyone who contributed to LTE may request access to this stream. (Please DM me.)
  • We shall probably have regular zoom meetings to (biweekly?) in addition to the zulip discussions.

Best regards,
Johan (on behalf of Adam and Patrick)
